properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_PRODUCT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM(SELECT PRO_NO ,SHOP_FILE_NO ,PRO_NAME ,PRO_MENUAL ,PRICE FROM TB_PRODUCT P WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY P.PRO_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT PRO_NO ,FILE_NO ,PRO_NAME ,PRO_MENUAL ,PRICE ,STATUS FROM TB_PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN TB_SHOPMEDIAFILE ON (SHOP_FILE_NO=FILE_NO) WHERE PRO_NO = ? AND P.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_PRODUCT SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE PRO_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
